title: Cardioprotective effect of antioxidant combination therapy: A highlight on MitoQ plus alpha-lipoic acid beneficial impact on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in aged rats
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Zohreh Zavvari Oskuye, Keyvan Mehri, Behnaz Mokhtari, Soleyman Bafadam, Samira Nemati, Reza Badalzadeh
